level.heading: Health services.
level.text: ยง 9-108 Health services. The New York city health and hospital corporation shall arrange for and make available facilities for outpatient treatment and suitable amenities for the continuance of social therapy for all persons who have received such treatment in conformance with section 9-107 of this code. Such continued treatment shall be voluntary, and shall commence upon the discharge of such persons from any penal institution and/or upon the termination of any period of parole.
